      • createRefund

        InvoicePaymentModelDao createRefund(UUID paymentId,
                                  BigDecimal amount,
                                  boolean isInvoiceAdjusted,
                                  Map<UUID,BigDecimal> invoiceItemIdsWithAmounts,
                                  UUID paymentCookieId,
                                  InternalCallContext context)
                                    throws InvoiceApiException
        Create a refund.
        Parameters:
        paymentId - payment associated with that refund
        amount - amount to refund
        isInvoiceAdjusted - whether the refund should trigger an invoice or invoice item adjustment
        invoiceItemIdsWithAmounts - invoice item ids and associated amounts to adjust
        paymentCookieId - payment cookie id
        context - the call context
        Returns:
        the created invoice payment object associated with this refund
        Throws:
        InvoiceApiException

      • getExternalChargeById

        InvoiceItemModelDao getExternalChargeById(UUID externalChargeId,
                                        InternalTenantContext context)
                                          throws InvoiceApiException
        Retrieve am external charge by id.
        Parameters:
        externalChargeId - the external charge id
        Returns:
        the external charge invoice item
        Throws:
        InvoiceApiException

      • insertExternalCharge

        InvoiceItemModelDao insertExternalCharge(UUID accountId,
                                       @Nullable
                                       UUID invoiceId,
                                       @Nullable
                                       UUID bundleId,
                                       @Nullable
                                       String description,
                                       BigDecimal amount,
                                       org.joda.time.LocalDate effectiveDate,
                                       Currency currency,
                                       InternalCallContext context)
                                         throws InvoiceApiException
        Add an external charge to a given account and invoice. If invoiceId is null, a new invoice will be created.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        invoiceId - the invoice id
        bundleId - the bundle id
        description - a description for that charge
        amount - the external charge amount
        effectiveDate - the day to post the external charge, in the account timezone
        currency - the external charge currency
        context - the call context
        Returns:
        the newly created external charge invoice item
        Throws:
        InvoiceApiException

      • getCreditById

        InvoiceItemModelDao getCreditById(UUID creditId,
                                InternalTenantContext context)
                                  throws InvoiceApiException
        Retrieve a credit by id.
        Parameters:
        creditId - the credit id
        Returns:
        the credit invoice item
        Throws:
        InvoiceApiException

      • insertCredit

        InvoiceItemModelDao insertCredit(UUID accountId,
                               @Nullable
                               UUID invoiceId,
                               BigDecimal amount,
                               org.joda.time.LocalDate effectiveDate,
                               Currency currency,
                               InternalCallContext context)
        Add a credit to a given account and invoice. If invoiceId is null, a new invoice will be created.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        invoiceId - the invoice id
        amount - the credit amount
        effectiveDate - the day to grant the credit, in the account timezone
        currency - the credit currency
        context - the call context
        Returns:
        the newly created credit invoice item

      • insertInvoiceItemAdjustment

        InvoiceItemModelDao insertInvoiceItemAdjustment(UUID accountId,
                                              UUID invoiceId,
                                              UUID invoiceItemId,
                                              org.joda.time.LocalDate effectiveDate,
                                              @Nullable
                                              BigDecimal amount,
                                              @Nullable
                                              Currency currency,
                                              InternalCallContext context)
        Adjust an invoice item.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        invoiceId - the invoice id
        invoiceItemId - the invoice item id to adjust
        effectiveDate - adjustment effective date, in the account timezone
        amount - the amount to adjust. Pass null to adjust the full amount of the original item
        currency - the currency of the amount. Pass null to default to the original currency used
        context - the call context
        Returns:
        the newly created adjustment item

      • deleteCBA

        void deleteCBA(UUID accountId,
             UUID invoiceId,
             UUID invoiceItemId,
             InternalCallContext context)
               throws InvoiceApiException
        Delete a CBA item.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        invoiceId - the invoice id
        invoiceItemId - the invoice item id of the cba item to delete
        Throws:
        InvoiceApiException

                                                InternalCallContext context)
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account for which we need to rebalance the CBA
        context - the callContext
